svg.text: Week in Ethereum News - January 6 2024

title: "Week in Ethereum News
January 6, 2024" date: "2024-01-05"
Eth News and Links
Dencun (Cancun + Deneb) upgrade (meta EIP7569 )
â€¢ Latest all core devs â€“ execution (ACDE) call video . Recap by lightclient .Â Notes from lightclient
& Christine Kim : Testnet upgrade dates confirmed (assumes no issues): Goerli Jan 17, Sepolia Jan 30 &
HoleÅ¡ky Feb 7 Pectra (Prague + Electra) : discussed small feature upgrade first vs focusing on Verkle
(~18 months) and reviewed proposed EIPs Precompile address ranges : proposed EIP7587 (reserves
0x100-0x1ff for RIPs)
â€¢ Testnet upgrade dates confirmed (assumes no issues): Goerli Jan 17, Sepolia Jan 30 & HoleÅ¡ky Feb 7
Testnet upgrade dates confirmed (assumes no issues): Goerli Jan 17, Sepolia Jan 30 & HoleÅ¡ky Feb 7
â€¢ Pectra (Prague + Electra) : discussed small feature upgrade first vs focusing on Verkle (~18 months)
and reviewed proposed EIPs
Pectra (Prague + Electra) : discussed small feature upgrade first vs focusing on Verkle (~18 months)
â€¢ Precompile address ranges : proposed EIP7587 (reserves 0x100-0x1ff for RIPs)
Precompile address ranges : proposed EIP7587 (reserves 0x100-0x1ff for RIPs)
Centralization watch: threatening the value of your ETH
â€¢ ðŸš¨ Lido at 31.71% is far too close to 33.3% threshold
ðŸš¨ Lido at 31.71% is far too close to 33.3% threshold
â€¢ Client diversity (via clientdiversity.org ): Execution layer: Geth ~84% supermajority, could
possibly cause a chain split, estimated to cost billions of dollars Consensus layer: Prysm 41%, any
client bug over 33.3% could mean loss of finality
Client diversity (via clientdiversity.org ):
â€¢ Execution layer: Geth ~84% supermajority, could possibly cause a chain split, estimated to cost
billions of dollars
Execution layer: Geth ~84% supermajority, could possibly cause a chain split, estimated to cost
â€¢ Consensus layer: Prysm 41%, any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss of finality
Consensus layer: Prysm 41%, any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss of finality
â€¢ Better geographic diversity is optimal , particularly outside of North America & Europe
Better geographic diversity is optimal , particularly outside of North America & Europe
Layer 1
â€¢ libp2p TCP vs QUIC : TCP ~2x speed of QUIC
Client releases
â€¢ Consensus layer: Nimbus v24.1.0 : Goerli testnet Dencun upgrade and adds v3 blocks/{slot} Beacon API
end-point
Consensus layer:
â€¢ Nimbus v24.1.0 : Goerli testnet Dencun upgrade and adds v3 blocks/{slot} Beacon API end-point
â€¢ Execution layer: Erigon v2.56.0 : Goerli testnet Dencun upgrade Nethermind v1.25.0-rc : Goerli
testnet Dencun upgrade and OP Stack Canyon support
Execution layer:
â€¢ Erigon v2.56.0 : Goerli testnet Dencun upgrade
Erigon v2.56.0 : Goerli testnet Dencun upgrade
â€¢ Nethermind v1.25.0-rc : Goerli testnet Dencun upgrade and OP Stack Canyon support
Nethermind v1.25.0-rc : Goerli testnet Dencun upgrade and OP Stack Canyon support
Research
â€¢ Proposer selection with EIP7251 (increase max effective balance): probability remains the same for
consolidated validators
MEV
â€¢ Terence: timing games with blobs (post Dencun upgrade), may be more unpredictable
Terence: timing games with blobs (post Dencun upgrade), may be more unpredictable
â€¢ Timing.pics (dashboard of timing games): missed slots & bids selected by entity
Timing.pics (dashboard of timing games): missed slots & bids selected by entity
Layer 2
â€¢ Arbitrum Orbit supports using an ERC20 token for gas
Arbitrum Orbit supports using an ERC20 token for gas
â€¢ L2s TVL flips other L1s
L2s TVL flips other L1s
EIPs/Standards
â€¢ EIPs Informational EIP7587 : Reserve precompile address range for RIPs
EIPs
â€¢ Informational EIP7587 : Reserve precompile address range for RIPs
â€¢ ERCs (application layer): ERC7586 : Interest rate swaps ERC7588 : Blob transactions metadata JSON
schema
ERCs (application layer):
â€¢ ERC7586 : Interest rate swaps
ERC7586 : Interest rate swaps
â€¢ ERC7588 : Blob transactions metadata JSON schema
ERC7588 : Blob transactions metadata JSON schema
Stuff for developers
â€¢ Reminder: Solidity developer survey 2023 closes January 7
Reminder: Solidity developer survey 2023 closes January 7
â€¢ Foundry multibuild : GitHub Action to test building project with range of Solidity versions
Foundry multibuild : GitHub Action to test building project with range of Solidity versions
â€¢ Overview of proxy contracts
Overview of proxy contracts
â€¢ Wagmi v2 : TanStack Query support, connect multiple connectors, switch chains while disconnected and
EIP6963 (multi injected provider discovery) support
Wagmi v2 : TanStack Query support, connect multiple connectors, switch chains while disconnected and
â€¢ Viem v2 : low-level OP Stack actions & utilities and enhanced types
Viem v2 : low-level OP Stack actions & utilities and enhanced types
â€¢ Secureum RACE #25: 8 question Solidity quiz & answers
Secureum RACE #25: 8 question Solidity quiz & answers
Security
â€¢ Gamma (liquidity management) $4.5M exploit on Arbitrum via price manipulation
Gamma (liquidity management) $4.5M exploit on Arbitrum via price manipulation
â€¢ Radiant (Aave v2 fork) $4.5M exploit of new USDC market on Arbitrum via known rounding issue
Radiant (Aave v2 fork) $4.5M exploit of new USDC market on Arbitrum via known rounding issue
Ecosystem
â€¢ Vitalikâ€™s updated roadmap diagram single slot finality (SSF) to resolve PoS design weaknesses,
significant progress on rollups & Verkle trees, scourge redesigned, state expiry a low priority and
VDFs dead for now
Vitalikâ€™s updated roadmap diagram
â€¢ single slot finality (SSF) to resolve PoS design weaknesses, significant progress on rollups &
Verkle trees, scourge redesigned, state expiry a low priority and VDFs dead for now
â€¢ Devcon Southeast Asia in Bangkok, November 12-15
Devcon Southeast Asia in Bangkok, November 12-15
Onchain stats
â€¢ Gas fees (via ultrasound.money ): 7.9 to 329.4 gwei, with 19.8 gwei average Zero net issuance
currently at 22.0 gwei 1.7k ETH net issuance this week
Gas fees (via ultrasound.money ): 7.9 to 329.4 gwei, with 19.8 gwei average
â€¢ Zero net issuance currently at 22.0 gwei
Zero net issuance currently at 22.0 gwei
â€¢ 1.7k ETH net issuance this week
1.7k ETH net issuance this week
â€¢ ETHUSD : $2,187 - $2,434, currently $2,246
ETHUSD : $2,187 - $2,434, currently $2,246
â€¢ ETHBTC : currently 0.051 (Flippening at ~0.16)
ETHBTC : currently 0.051 (Flippening at ~0.16)
Notable at app layer
â€¢ Vitalik calls for L2 CCIP resolvers for low cost ENS subdomains
Vitalik calls for L2 CCIP resolvers for low cost ENS subdomains
â€¢ Daimo bundle compression reduces cost of ERC4337 transactions on L2
Daimo bundle compression reduces cost of ERC4337 transactions on L2

Job Listings
â€¢ Status is hiring: Technical Chief Operating Officer - Apply here
Status is hiring: Technical Chief Operating Officer - Apply here
â€¢ ZK circuits engineer sought by EF Privacy & Scaling Explorations team
ZK circuits engineer sought by EF Privacy & Scaling Explorations team
Job listings: $600 for 4 issues (75 char limit). Pay using 3cities. Questions? abcoathup at-gmail
Regulation/business/tokens
â€¢ US tax code: receipt of $10k+ in crypto (for trade/business) to be reported to IRS within 15 days
US tax code: receipt of $10k+ in crypto (for trade/business) to be reported to IRS within 15 days
â€¢ SBF second trial dropped by DoJ , including charges for unlawful campaign contributions
SBF second trial dropped by DoJ , including charges for unlawful campaign contributions
â€¢ Logan Paulâ€™s CryptoZoo buy back after game not delivered, in exchange for waiving claims
Logan Paulâ€™s CryptoZoo buy back after game not delivered, in exchange for waiving claims
â€¢ UK users of centralized exchanges required to complete investor declaration
UK users of centralized exchanges required to complete investor declaration
General
â€¢ Orbit bridge $81M hack
Orbit bridge $81M hack
â€¢ Orange Spain internet outage , RIPE account hacked to misconfigure BGP routing & RPKI config
Orange Spain internet outage , RIPE account hacked to misconfigure BGP routing & RPKI config
Follow @WeekinEthNews to find out what the most clicked links are. Follow @abcoathup and
@evan_van_ness to get most of the weekâ€™s news in real time.
